mapper.insert: insert into member2 (userid, passwd, name, jumin, email, zipcode, addr1, addr2, phone) values (#{userid},#{passwd},#{name},#{jumin},#{email}, #{zipcode},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{phone})
mapper.select: select * from zipcode2013 where dong like #{dong}
select count(userid) cnt from member2 where userid = #{uid}
select userid, name, email, regdate from member2 where userid = #{userid} and passwd = #{passwd}
